create_enterprises: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS enterprises (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, organization_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, fiscal_identification VARCHAR(100), commercial_name VARCHAR(255), website VARCHAR(500), normalized_address TEXT, acquisition_source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'other', internal_owner VARCHAR(255), notes TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
create_enterprise_tags: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS enterprise_tags (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, color VARCHAR(7), description TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
create_enterprises_tags: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS enterprises_tags (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, enterprises_id INTEGER, tag_id INTEGER, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT enterprises_tags_enterprises_id_tag_id_key UNIQUE (enterprises_id, tag_id));
add_enterprises_tags_fkeys: ALTER TABLE enterprises_tags ADD CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS enterprises_tags_enterprises_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (enterprises_id) REFERENCES enterprises(id) ON DELETE CASCADE; ALTER TABLE enterprises_tags ADD CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS enterprises_tags_tag_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES enterprise_tags(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;
create_people_basic: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS people (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, position_title VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(100), linkedin TEXT, primary_email VARCHAR(320), phone_prefix VARCHAR(10), phone_number VARCHAR(20), enterprise_relation_id INTEGER, decision_level VARCHAR(50), acquisition_source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'other', internal_owner VARCHAR(255), notes TEXT, communication_consent BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
add_people_fkey: ALTER TABLE people ADD CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS fk_people_enterprise_relation FOREIGN KEY (enterprise_relation_id) REFERENCES enterprises(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;
